name: 02-knex-setup
description: * `npm init -y` * `git init` * create `.gitignore` file * Third Party Packages     - `npm install -D nodemon` Automatic Server Restart     - `npm install -D typescript` Run __.ts__ files     - `tsc --init` Create ts configuration file     - `npm install -D ts-node` Recognize the __.ts__ files     - `npm install -D @types/express` Run the express on typescript       - `npm install express` Server-side web framework     - `npm install dot-env` * typeorm setup     - `npm install typeorm`     - `npm install reflect-metadata`     - `npm install mysql2` * create data-sourse configuration file  * create database on mysql
